There were two ways to get there:

(1) Take bus No. 5002 from Exit 10 of Gangnam Station (Seoul Subway Line 2), 200 meters ahead. It runs every 30 minutes. 5002: via Sincheon Station - Gangnam Station - Yangjae Station.

Travel time: 40-50 minutes, fare: 2,500 won (one way)

Disadvantages: Buses run every 30 minutes, and many people have to queue up. If the bus is full, you are not allowed to get on.

Everland, located in Yongin, Gyeonggi Province, is a large theme park featuring a zoo, amusement park, a bobsleigh park, and a botanical garden. It is currently ranked among the top 10 theme parks worldwide.

It comprises five themed zones: Global Expo, American Adventure, Magic Land, European Adventure, and Equatorial Adventure. It also frequently hosts 4D concerts by K-pop stars.

Equatorial Adventure is a major draw for Everland, featuring innovative exhibits such as "Animal Wonderland," Korea's first ape zone, and the "Fantastic Flight" of ten chickens, all of which are highly praised.

Everland also hosts unique seasonal festivals throughout the year, including the Ski Festival, Tulip Festival, Rose Festival, and Halloween Festival. Its parades and performances are recognized worldwide.
